text: Hermann Palka (born 21 March 1921) was an Austrian bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. At the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo, he finished fifth in the four-man event. ==References== *1952 bobsleigh four-man results *Bobsleigh four-man result: 1948-64 * Category:Austrian male bobsledders Category:Bobsledders at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Possibly living people Category:1921 births
title: Hermann Palka
